products.description: Make your home feel contemporary and fresh with the ecostyle taped opal faux wood blind in cream. Featuring stone vertical taping and a gentle grained finish, this piece has plenty of charm. It may look exactly like wood, but in fact the blind is made from pvc, giving it the advantage of being fully waterproof and resistant to warping. products.description: The nile range of wood blinds is available in several distinctive forest colours and also available in different slat widths so will suit any window in your home. This classic cream wood blind will look great in rooms with neutral decor or as a contrast to darker colours. At swift direct blinds, we take quality seriously. With over fifty years experience in manufacturing and selling blinds in the uk, their wooden blinds are made by their expert team, and packed and shipped to your doorstep.

products.title: Baa Baa Peony Roman Blind
products.description: Quirky and fun, the baa baa roman blind is produced from 100% cotton by prestigious textiles. This design is manufactured in the peony colourway, but 2 other options are available. The fun sheep design is on trend, and you can guarantee will become a conversation point within your home. Quality is important to us and we check your blind at multiple stages in its manufacture to ensure you receive the perfect blind for your home.

products.title: Baa Baa Duckegg Roman Blind
products.description: Their baa baa range features cute sheep, with fashionable tartain, striped and checked coats, on a soft dandelion-dotted field. This duckegg baa-tastic design withits chic light blue colour palette and smiling cream sheep, is a nod to their farming and industrial history, and looks fantastic as a roman blind. Not only does this roman blind envoke feelings of softness with its design, its also made from 100% cotton material - providing your roman blind a light and breathable base.

products.title: Panama Marble Roman Blind
products.description: This roman blind is made from 100% cotton and is the perfect enhancement for your interior. Available in a wide range of colours this fabric is one of their most popular best sellers. Suitable for any room, this range brings simplicity and style to your windows at a price that doesnt harm your pocket. At swift direct blinds quality is always important to us, one reason their customers have voted us excellent on trustpilot reviews.

products.title: Milano, Waterfall - Vertical Blind
products.description: To create a dcor scheme with calming colour and creativity, opt for the enchanting milano in waterfall. This exquisite cloth features a restful cornflower blue shade and a fusion of silk-inspired threads for added decoration and texture. Plus, modern, adaptable louvres allow you to control the amount of light and breeze entering the room. Perfect for a relaxing restroom, the waterfall can be matched with a soft white background and complementing features in chalky blue and azure tones.

products.title: Lusso, Cream - Vertical Blind
products.description: The lusso in cream has a paper-soft feel, making it a pleasing and appealing blind to touch. Its hue is a beautiful, homely cream, perfect for hanging in a modern family home. Between the discreet stitching and the texture of the fabric, a lightly checked appearance is formed, whilst the blind is all one colour. The cream would make a perfect addition to the kitchen, where its functional look and feel will suit the purpose of the room wonderfully.

products.title: Burlington, Mantis - Vertical Blind
products.description: In soft mint green, the burlington mantis is a traditionally patterned blind with the contemporary edge of the vertically hanging louvres. The gentle curves of the pattern are intricately stitched, offering a feeling of depth and texture. Opt for a cool colour palette in the kitchen to keep the room feeling light and airy by pairing the mantis with pure whites. Keep the base of the room white, using matching mint hues to accessorise, and go for silver fixtures and fittings to complement.

products.title: Origin, Champagne - Venetian Blind
products.description: Origin champagne is the touch of natural luxury that you have been searching for. With every slat created by masters of their craft you have the perfect canvas for the gentle fizzle of this off-white masterpiece. The touch of luxury and effortless style that every home deserves. Origin, champagne - venetian blind origin champagne is the touch of natural luxury that you have been searching for.

products.title: Loras Blackout Sonnet Roller Blind
products.description: Country life is beautifully depicted in this printed fabric roller blind, with softly sketched singing birds, green stems and delicate white blooms that meander over a pretty sage green backdrop. The loras sonnet blackout roller blind brings you the beauty of nature, whilst the effective blackout fabric keeps your interior shaded and peaceful until youre ready to let the outside in.
